Supply Chain Intelligence Release Notes 24.1 

Last updated:  03/21/2024

 

  • Framework Updates
  • Other Updates

 

Framework Updates

 

The following table summarizes updates made to the existing Omni packages:

Package Name New/Existing Description
Inventory Management Existing

Added:

  •  Inventory Backorder Items to the Inventory Item table
  • Inventory Reservation Request Detail to the Inventory Reservation for Request Match table

 

Other Updates

 

New columns to the Fulfillment entity, namely Fulfillment Is ROPIS and Fulfillment Consider ROPIS Paid, facilitate the Reserve Online Pickup In-Store (ROPIS) feature. ROPIS orders involve customers reserving or holding inventory without upfront payment and picking up the items at the store. These additional columns empower users to generate reports and analyze data, providing insights into this functionality.
